programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Dearest Family: Galette day this year is eventful for Marinette; Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! (S4 Ep21)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Ephemeral: What if Ladybug and Cat Noir found out about each other's secret identities? (S4 Ep22)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Kuro Neko: If Cat Noir decided to quit and give his Miraculous back to Ladybug, who could possibly replace him? (S4 Ep23)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Penalteam: When one of Shadow Moth's favorite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superheroes to face her. (S4 Ep24)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Puppets: L.J. feels like a puppet, pulled between teen and Jade life. When a Shard in a singing bowl makes people mindless vessels, the Crimson Lord gets a puppet army. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: For A Few Duncans More: While using Chef's fancy new copier, Duncan accidentally makes an entire other Duncan. Great! But things go badly when the other Duncan decides to copy himself too. (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Reverser: A student named Marc gets akumatized into Reverser. Convinced that Marinette and Nathaniel made a fool of him, he seeks revenge. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Malediktator: When Chloe threatens to leave Paris, Mr Bourgeois gets akumatized into Maledikator. Will Ladybug manage to stop him? (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Anansi: Alya's sister Nora gets akumatized into Anansi. Now a giant spider woman, she wants to show Alya how dangerous Paris can be. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Sandboy: While Tikki isn't with her, Marinette finds out that a mysterious supervillain is bringing the Parisians' bad dreams to life! (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Tiger Trouble: The Memorial Fountain's not supposed to wipe memories! As Jade works to save Ban Tang from amnesia, Black Tiger catnaps Baihu. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: A Message From the Future - Goku Black Invades!: Future Trunks describes how he came to arrive in the present. But apparently not even the gods are allowed to meddle with the past. (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Goku vs Black! The Road Towards the Sealed Future: Black suddenly appears from a mysterious portal. Goku sees this as an opportunity to test his look-alike's power firsthand. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: The Collector: Ladybug and Cat Noir face the Collector, alias Gabriel Agreste. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Prime Queen: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Nadia Chamack, now Prime Queen. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Carving: Duncan takes advantage of a questionable Halloween legend to steal candy from his classmates. (S2 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Baby Brother Blues: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runsaway to find a new family. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Space Codyty: Izzy, convinced that Cody is an alien, embarks on a journey through space to take him back home. (S2 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gobble Head: Chef accidentally cooks up a killer cyborg turkey in a failed attempt to get the kids to appreciate him on Appreciation Day. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Robo Teacher: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks it's going to be the best day ever. He's wrong. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Glove Glove Me Do: Owen's newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tooth About Zombies: Gwen's favourite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beth's nightmare event, dental check-up day. The two girls find a way to help each other out. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Twm yn cynnal noson arswydus i'w ffrindiau! On today's poptastic adventure, Plom is having a spooky sleepover for his friends!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Shani y poni ac Annie a'i chwn defaid. Today we meet Shani the pony and Annie and her sheep dogs.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan y Capten botel ddiddorol, mae Seren yn chwarae photiau halen a phupur, ac mae Fflwff yn mwynhau powlenaid o gawl. Today, the Captain has an interesting bottle...

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae'r teulu'n dweud y drefn wrth Stiw am wneud gormod o swn, felly mae'n penderfynu gadael cartre'. Stiw is told he is making too much noise, so he decides to leave home.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Tomos yn cael parti chwaraeon gyda Huw Cyw. Today, Tomos will be having a sports party with Huw from Cyw.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn bach heddiw? What's happening in the Paw Patrol world today?

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: A fydd Tryfan yn llwyddo i neidio nol ar gefn ei feic mynydd i gystadlu yn y ras ar ei ddiwrnod mawr? Tryfan's a daring mountain biker, but will he get back in the saddle for his big day?

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol am lwynog coch yn cysgu ac yna'n deffro'n barod am ddiwrnod hyfryd. A traditional lullaby about a red fox sleeping soundly before waking up, ready for another day.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: I ble ma Hen Begor yn sleifio'n gyfrinachol bob wythnos? Mae Twm Twrch a Dorti yn penderfynu ei ddilyn. Where is Hen Begor sneaking off each week? Twm Twrch and Dorti decide to follow him.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Beca to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Gwich a'i frawd yn mynd charafn Crawc ar daith drwy gefn gwlad buan iawn mae ffrae yn codi rhwng y brodyr. Sibling jealousies rise to the surface when Gwich goes on holiday.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Deian yn chwaraewr hunanol ac yn gwrthod pashio'r bl! Will Deian and Loli be able to help the Blues or will Deian's selfish tendencies with the ball stop them from getting victory?!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, awn i Sbaen i gwrdd a'r Wenynen Feirch ac i Awstralia er mwyn cael cwrdd a'r Ecidna. We're off to Spain to meet the Wasp and to Australia to get to know the Echidna.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae cerdyn post o Hawaii gan Wncwl Wil yn ysbrydoli Anni a Lili i ail greu Hawaii yn y gegin! A postcard from Hawaii from Uncle Wil inspires Anni and Lili to create Hawaii in the kitchen!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Dilys y cocyrpw ac Aneira a'i chrwbanod. Today we meet Dilys the cockerpoo and Aneira and her tortoises.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu ynghyd a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar drydydd bore'r Wyl. The start of the competition along with all the news and information on the third morning.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Seremoni'r Dydd: Medal Dysgwyr
programme.desc: Uchafbwynt y dydd - darllediad byw o brif seremoniau'r dydd, Medal y Dysgwyr a Bobi Jones. A live broadcast of the day's main Ceremonies, the Learners' Medal and Bobi Jones.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Gweddill cystadlaethau disgyblion iau yr ysgolion uwchradd, gyda Trystan Ellis Morris ac Heledd Cynwal ar drydydd diwrnod y 'Steddfod. The rest of the secondary school juniors' competitions.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Mae rhaglen ola'r gyfres yn mynd ni o Angle hyd at ddiwedd llwybr yr arfordir yn Amroth. The final episode takes us from Angle all the way to the end of the coastal path in Amroth.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n ymuno yn yr hwyl yng Ngwyl y Gelli, a chawn sgwrs gyda'r gantores, Rhian Jorj. We join in the fun at the Hay Festival, and have a chat with singer, Rhian Jorj.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mercher Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025, ac mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of the Wednesday at the Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau wanders the field.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn nhref Rhydaman yr wythnos hon i helpu cangen Derwen Newydd o elusen y Wallich. The gang are in Ammanford this week to help the Derwen Newydd branch of the Wallich charity.

programme.title: Guinness World Records Cymru 2025
programme.desc: Ymdrechion i dorri recordiau Guinness World Records Cymru 2025: menywod cryf yn tynnu Injan, blodau diri, raff trapeze, a mwy! We follow attempts to break Guinness World Records Cymru 2025.

programme.title: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mercher Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025, ac mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of the Wednesday at the Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau wanders the field.

programme.title: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mercher Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025, ac mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of the Wednesday at the Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau wanders the field.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Home Shopping.

programme.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am
programme.desc: ..programmes start at 6.00am

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Pan ddaw hi'n amser mynd i gartref Gyrdi, mae'r criw yn sylweddoli ei bod hi'n amhosib i bawb ffitio y tu mewn i'w gragen! The gang have a probem fitting inside Gurdy's shell!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Glenys Gas yn syrthio i mewn i drap roedd hi'n ei wneud ar gyfer Digbi. Glenys Gas falls into a tricksy-trap she was making for Digbi and can't climb out.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn gofyn 'Pam bod gwyfynod yn hoffi golau?' ac mae Tad-cu'n ateb mai gwyfynod ddyfeisiodd golau. Nel asks why moths like the light, and Tadcu tells her that moths invented light.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Wrth fynd allan i'r mr, mae Twt a Tanwen yn dod o hyd i forfil yn sownd yn y rhew. Twt and Tanwen come across a whale stuck in the ice. How will they free him?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Fun with characters like Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn tybio bod artist wedi paentio patrwm sgwiglyd ar do Tomi. Ond ma nhw'n dysgu mwy am wlithod! The Woohoos wonder who on earth has painted a squiggly pattern on Scotty's roof?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae'r pentrefwyr yn helpu Magi gasglu cnwd o fefus. Yn anffodus, wedi damwain gyda phl droed, mae'r mefus yn cael eu malu. A mishap with a football results in Magi's fruits being crushed.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym mhentre Pontypandy heddiw? What's happening in Pontypandy today?

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wedi i Cregynnog a Harri gael damwain, maen nhw'n cael help gan Lysywen Farus a physgodyn Grwper. Cregynnog and Harri crash their Gups and need some help from an eel and a grouper fish.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: A bookshelf has broken in Carmarthen library; Harry goes to help Gruff and Yvonne fix it. Yn llyfrgell Caerfyrddin, ma silff lyfrau wedi torri - ffwrdd a Harri i helpu Yvonne a Gruff.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Amser stori yw un o hoff amserau Bobo Gwyn o'r dydd a heddiw mae'n clywed stori sy'n tanio'i ddychymyg! Bobo Gwyn loves storytime and today he hears a story which fires his imagination.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn cael ei ddiarddel o'r Clwb Trn gan Conyn. Yn annisgwyl mae'n dod yn ffrind i Glenys sydd yn ei wahodd i ymuno 'i Chlwb Cnau. Cochyn is ejected from The Train Club by Conyn.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Stori am ddau gi bach direidus, sydd wrth eu bodd yn gwisgo esgidiau, sydd gan Cari i ni heddiw. Today, Cari tells the tale of two mischievous dogs, who love wearing shoes.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae Ben a'r Abadas yn chwarae Gem y Geiriau. Mae'r gair newydd i'w ganfod yn y ty. Tybed beth yw e? Ben and the Abadas play The Word Game. Today's word can be found in the house. What is it?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd i ganol y coed a'r planhigion yn y jwngl. Mae'r Tralalas yn cael hwyl yn siglo ar y coed! The crew go to the jungle to marvel at trees and plants galore.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae angen atgyweirio Pont Gylch ond wrth baratoi i wneud hynny aiff Sim yn sownd mewn gwe pry cop! Blero helps his friends mend Pont Gylch but along the way Sim gets in a sticky situation.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc, a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Jet-fam yn gyrru Jetboi ar dasgau "diflas". Ond, o dipyn i beth, mae'n sylweddoli mai hyfforddiant ar gyfer ei dasg bwysicaf eto oedd y cyfan. Jet-mom drives Jet-boy on "boring" errands.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Bro Eirwg sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Bro Eirwg join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn darganfod olion traed MAWR ac ma' nhw eisiau gwybod i ba greadur anhygoel maen nhw'n perthyn. The Woohoos discover some BIG muddy footprints footprints - who do they belong to?

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Norman yn awyddus i gael sgwp ar y papur lleol, ond fel arfer ma pethau'n mynd o chwith!! Norman is keen to get a scoop in the local paper but, as usual, things go wrong!!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar bedwerydd fore'r Wyl. The start of the competitions plus all the news and information on the festival's fourth morning.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Gweddill cystadlaethau'r disgyblion ysgolion uwchradd yng nghwmni Trystan ac Heledd. The rest of the secondary school pupils' competitions, plus Alun Williams wanders the Eisteddfod field.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Trip i'r brifddinas sy'n galw'r tro ma wrth i Beti a Huw aros yn Parador 44, gwesty a redir gan deulu'r Owens. This time: a trip to family hotel, Parador 44.and a pop-in to Clwb Ifor Bach.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Mae Mei Emrys yma wrth iddo ryddhau ei sengl newydd, ac edrychwn ymlaen at benwythnos o bel-droed i fenywod Cymru. Mei Emrys is here & we look forward to a weekend of Welsh womens football.

programme.title: Serpent's Lair
programme.desc: 1995. Horror. Director: Jeffrey Reiner. Stars Jeff Fahey, Heather Medway & Kathleen Noone. Shortly after a young couple move into their new home, their marriage becomes plagued by a Satanic force. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Tales of vengeance and murder are on the cards for next week, as Caroline Munro gives us a sneaky peek at the upcoming films. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: Child's Play. 1984. Stars Mary Crosby, Nicholas Clay & Debbie Chasan. A family awakens to find themselves trapped in their own home and must quickly find a way to escape. [S]

programme.title: Scarlet Street
programme.desc: 1945. Drama. Director: Fritz Lang. Stars Edward G. Robinson, Joan Bennett & Dan Duryea. A banker in a dying marriage falls for a thug's girlfriend. They find a way to cash in on his infatuation. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Flying Soldier
programme.desc: 1965. A captivating look at how members of the British army are trained to fly helicopters.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly's Animals. 1963. Stars Bea Benaderet, Buddy Ebsen & Eddie Dean. Pearl plans to give music lessons to the people of Beverly Hills but her yodelling upsets the neighbours and Duke the dog. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: A Time To Run. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Cesar Romero. A wounded man tries to hijack Luke's stagecoach, but passes out from loss of blood before he can ride away. [S]

programme.title: Jackpot (1960)
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director Montgomery Tully. Stars William Hartnell, Betty McDowall & Eddie Byrne. An ex-convict learns that his wife is not willing to return to him. A rare screening of a 'lost' film. [S]

programme.title: Chasing the Blues
programme.desc: 1946. An insightful short film about improving post war productivity in the mills with a bit of modern jazz.

programme.title: The Limping Man
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Frank (Lloyd Bridges), an American, returns to England to see his war-time sweetheart (Moira Lister) but witnesses a shooting whilst leaving the plane. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Sweet Life
programme.desc: 1966. An exciting glimpse into Britain's colourful confectionery industry.

programme.title: Not Wanted On Voyage
programme.desc: 1957. Comedy. The rollicking adventures of two stewards aboard a pleasure cruiser. Starring Ronald Shiner and Brian Rix. [S]

programme.title: Tom Brown's Schooldays (1951)
programme.desc: 1951. Starring Robert Newton, John Howard Davis, Sir Michael Hordern and Max Bygraves. A faithful rendition of the Thomas Hughes book of life at the famed Rugby School for Boys. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of May and beginning of June. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: A Bad Mistake. 1974. Stars Hilary Tindall, Gabrielle Drake & Colin Baker. Ann fears losing everything. Meanwhile, Edward meets prospective shareholders, but his honesty causes a setback. [S]

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: 1951. Western. Directed by Henry Hathaway. Stars Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward & Hugh Marlowe. A stagecoach stop employee and a young woman find themselves at the mercy of four desperate outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Join the amazing Vince Taylor as he performs the entrancing hit Twenty Flight Rock.

programme.title: The Happiness of Three Women
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Petula Clark, Donald Houston & Brenda de Banzie. Story of a Welsh postman's efforts to bring happiness into the lives of an assortment of people. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Dover Castle/The Psychic Healer. 1994. Michael Aspel introduces more unusual events, including paranormal activities at Dover Castle and Lorraine Ham, a remarkable healer who works with the NHS. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Guilt. 1977. Stars Douglas Fielding & James Ellis. Quilley was at school with Chris Murray and knows he wouldn't hurt a soul, so when Chris pleads guilty to a savage assault, he wants to know why. [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: The Losers. 1970. Stars Alfred Lynch, Robert Hardy & Cyd Hayman. Encouraged by Gratz and aided by the Resistance, Nina, Jimmy and Adelaide hope to escape to England. Can they make it to freedom? [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The Open Window. 2001. Stars Bruno Cremer, Florence Darel & Jacques Boudet. A shot is heard from the waiting room of a shady financier. Minutes later he is found dead. But was it murder? [S]

programme.title: Things to Come
programme.desc: 1936. Sci-fi. Director: William Cameron Menzies. Stars Raymond Massey, Edward Chapman & Ralph Richardson. Futuristic story about the devastation and struggles of society after a decades-long war. [S]

programme.title: Blind Rage
programme.desc: 1978. Action. Directed by Efren C. Pion. Stars Tony Ferrer, Leo Fong, Fred Williamson & Leila Hermosa. Five unstoppable blind men are recruited to steal $15 million in secret CIA loot. [S]

programme.title: Blind Rage
programme.desc: 1978. Action. Directed by Efren C. Pion. Stars Tony Ferrer, Leo Fong, Fred Williamson & Leila Hermosa. Five unstoppable blind men are recruited to steal $15 million in secret CIA loot. [S]

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: 1985. Adventure. Director: George Miller. Stars Christopher Reeve, Rosanna Arquette & Sam Wanamaker. A mail pilot and a rich man's daughter get stranded in the mountains after their plane crashes. [S]

programme.title: The Man Who Changed His Name
programme.desc: 1934. Drama. Lyn Harding plays Shelby Clive, who has been obliged to shorten his last name so that he won't be confused with a notorious (and never-apprehended) wife murderer. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Split Ticket. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. When O'Casey wins the lottery, they must find Albert before the ticket runs out. [S]

programme.title: Love from a Stranger
programme.desc: 1937. Drama. Stars Ann Harding, Basil Rathbone & Binnie Hale. A lottery winner breaks up with her fianc and marries a fortune hunter who proves to be dangerous. [S]

programme.title: King of the Underworld
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Director: Victor M. Gover. Stars Tod Slaughter, Patrick Barr and Tucker McGuire. A crook is implicated in blackmail, greed for emeralds, a secret formula and murder. [S]

programme.title: Bob's Your Uncle
programme.desc: 1942. Comedy. Directed by Oswald Mitchell. Stars Albert Modley, Wally Patch, H.F.Maltby & Johnnie Schofield. British Comedy that follows the adventures of enthusiastic members of the Home Guard. [S]

programme.title: Send For Paul Temple
programme.desc: 1946. Crime Drama. Directed by John Argyle. Starring Anthony Hulme and Joy Shelton. Scotland Yard calls in novelist and amateur detective Paul Temple to help track down a gang of diamond robbers. [S]

programme.title: Battle of the V1
programme.desc: 1958. War. Director: Vernon Sewell. Stars Michael Rennie, Patricia Medina & Christopher Lee. Polish Resistance discover a mysterious pilot-less plane. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Long Haired Leftie - Part 1. 1973. Stars William Mervyn, Ron Pember & David Calder. Semi-professional agitator Donald Dowd faces an illegal picketing charge and has chosen trial by jury. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Long Haired Leftie - Part 2. 1973. Stars David Calder & John Comer. The judge rejects the request to make the trial political and Sergeant Kershaw is questioned about Donald's arrest. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Long Haired Leftie - Part 3. 1973. Stars David Calder & Bernard Brown. Donald spends a second day in the witness box cross examined by Andrew, who attempts to expose his radical politics. [S]

programme.title: The Man Who Wouldn't Talk
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Director Herbert Wilcox. Stars Anna Neagle, Anthony Quaylea and Zsa Zsa Gabor. A barrister tries to defend her client, a U.S. scientist for killing his bride, who was a U.S. spy.

programme.title: Star Performance: Vote of Confidence
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: William Asher. Stars David Niven & Amanda Blake. A recently freed conman tries to convince an heiress' secretary that he needs money to run an orphanage.

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. This episode focuses on a wonderful tribute to Margaret Leighton. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: Fire! 1961. Stars John Ireland, Basil Dignam & Peter Elliott. An arsonist is on the loose in London, causing heavy losses for Eastern Insurance when a number of Stepney warehouses go up in flames. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Try, Try Again. 1976. Stars Jean Anderson, Richard Easton, Joby Blanshard. The Hammond Board has rejected Kirkman's offer but Brian feels that Hammonds need help if they are to function in Europe. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: Hustler. 1985. Stars Leigh Lawson, John Bird & Matthew Taylor. Lomax meets with his son Steve, but they run into trouble when Steve steals from a betting shop run by a local gang leader. [S]

programme.title: Time Without Pity
programme.desc: 1957. Crime. Director: Joseph Losey. Stars Michael Redgrave, Ann Todd, Leo McKern, Peter Cushing, Alec McCowan. David is an alcoholic who has 24 hours to save his son from being hanged for murder. [S]

programme.title: Bailout at 43,000
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director: Francis D. Lyon. Stars John Payne, Karen Steele and Paul Kelly. The story of the men who volunteered to be test subjects for the new ejection system for a new bomber plane. [S]

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: It's No Slice of Heaven: Masha learns to perform tricks. A wave of your hands, a secret spell, and... instead of a cute dove, a completely different bird flies out of the magic cylinder. (S6 Ep21)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Lilac Picnic: The Bear is going on a romantic date with the Female Bear. The picnic promises to be perfect because all around are fragrant lilacs, silence and... (S6 Ep22)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Welcome Out of Here: An unpleasant incident in the forest leaves the Bunny without a roof over his head, and the hospitable Bear decides to shelter Bunny in his home. (S6 Ep23)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Mustard's Little Brother: Mustard is annoyed because he has to take care of his little brother, Braylon, who drives everyone crazy. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Pamela lost a tooth, but the Tooth Fairy didn't visit her. The MiniWhats are outraged, so they set off in pursuit of the evil Tooth Fairy. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: At The Foot Of The Rainbow: Petula and Pamela set off on a magic pony in search of the treasure buried at the foot of the rainbow. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Little Yellow Riding Hood: Petula hasn't written her story for school, and it's due tomorrow. Ollie draws an old storybook and out pops Little Yellow Riding Hood, also known as Micheline. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Generous Genie: Mustard's skateboard was confiscated after he crossed the street without looking. Cars are so lame... If only one could fly over them! Ollie draws a magic lamp. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Mysterious Egyptian Pyramid: Mixo has decided to learn hieroglyphics, but if he really wants to do that, he needs to see the real thing, in Egypt. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Young Protectors: When Billy, Suzie and Jean-Claude discover crosses painted on certain trees in the forest, they believe what Agatha says: Kurt the Lumberjack has marked the trunks. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Let's Dance In The Rain!: Billy wants to learn how to play the banjo like his hero, Jessy Dog, so he asks his father to lend him his old banjo. (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Battle of the Little Guys: Billy, Suzie and JC have built a cabin in the woods. It's nearly finished but when they return, they find that TC, Marla and Marvin have occupied it! (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Farouk, The Little Horse: Jean-Claude wants to send a letter to his grandmother. He takes the letter to Dede, who usually takes the mail to the station, but Dede's bike is broken! (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna Girl's Sleepover: Amaya's friends Marie and Jennie get entranced and imperilled by LunaGirl. (S5 Ep22)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Dragon Dance: An Yu won't show Munki-gu how to do the Dragon Dance. But Night Ninja will... (S5 Ep23)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: An Yu and the Cave Stones: An Yu needs to find a magic stone in the city. (S5 Ep24)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Midnight Snack Attack: Gekko tries to get Pirate Robot to be a chief instead of a pirate. (S5 Ep25)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Voyage of the Golden Asteroid: Newton is desperate to study a rare asteroid, but Pirate Robot has seen it too and he is planning a hijack! (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Jane's Perfect Present: After the Jr Ranchers spend all their time trying to prepare a special surprise birthday gift for Jane, they find out what she wanted was to spend the day with them. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Cool It Carol!
programme.desc: A young couple journey to Swinging London in search of fame and fortune. But with work scarce, they get drawn into the seedy world of modelling and sex work. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
programme.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.
